title: Ghor, Kin Slayer: The Saga of Genseric's Fifth Born Son
description: The opening chapter is by Robert E. Howard, with followups by such writers as Karl Edward Wagner, Joseph Payne Brenna, Richard L. Tierney, Michael Moorcock, Charles Saunders, Andrew Offutt, Manly Wade Wellman, Darrell Schweitzer, A. E. Van Vogt, Brian Lumley, Frank Belknap Long, Adrian Cole, Ramsey Campbell, H. Warner Munn, Marion Zimmer Bradley and Richard A. Lupoff.
author: Robert E. Howard
